page.title: 17MORE WORRIES OF TODAY
page.content: I am worried about the church because nowadays most people don't go to church and a lot that do are not there for the right reasons. { (boy,aged10)} I worry when I go past old houses and building sites because a punk might jump out and hold a knife to my throat. {(boy,aged10) My first and biggest worry is the threat of nuclear war. I think it is really daft to buy weapons instead of using the money to, help Ethiopia more and get rid of drugs. {(boy,aged11)} I just wish the world would be at peace. {(Girl, aged11)
